group_1.textCenter: I'm not gonna go to the convention anymore.
I'm getting rid of my leg fetish.
I'm gonna throw out the books I've collected, too.

group_1.narration: When I heard her talk about abandoning what she likes,@I considered the possibility of something happening to her.
I must confirm her fate@with my Heaven's Gate Eye as soon as possible…!@Based on our chat logs,@I journeyed to Hokuyo Ward to search for her…

group_1.textCenter: (…This isn't the time to be imagining things@narration-style…)
(…She sent me a photo of a flower in the chat@earlier.)
(The Satomi Medical Center is in the background…)
(Never thought the tech for finding real-life locations@in anime would come in handy here…)
(This makes me feel a little more stalkerish@than I'd like, but…)
(Since someone's life is at stake…@I don't have a choice.)
(I heard she visits her friend often.)
(And I'm pretty sure this is the hospital@she goes to…)
(There's no guarantee she'll be here today, but…@this is my best bet…)
(You're kidding… She's actually here.)
(No, this is no time to be surprised.@I have to do what I came here for…)

group_1.narration: My magic, "Heaven's Gate Eye"…@allows me to see a person's proximity to death.

group_1.textCenter: (I hate to think about it,@but I'm getting a bad vibe from her…)
(Sorry, just let me check…!)
(Open your gaze… Heaven's Gate Eye!)
(…Thank God. Miyuri's okay for now…)
(But I'm sure she's still feeling pretty bad…)
(It's probably kind of weird for me to shove my nose@into her real-life stuff, but)
(she's a kindred soul who loves the same things@as me.)
(I can't just leave her like this…!)

group_1.textRight: M-Miyuri…!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Rui…?@What are you doing here…?

group_1.textRight: Well, that's, uh…
…Sorry…@I'm kinda nervous…

group_1.textLeft: After, after all, meeting in person still makes me@more nervous than talking on the phone…!

group_1.textRight: Sorry…
…We go through this every time we meet up@at events, don't we…?
…Okay, we're a little more relaxed now, I think.

group_1.textLeft: I think so too, I think so too.
So-so what did you want with me?
I was just about to go and throw away my collection.

group_1.textRight: …If you're talking about your collection, that means…
No way… You're going to throw out the holy books created by the gods?!
E-even the great MacQueen's games…?
Why…?!
The fact that you told me over the phone@that you weren't going to the convention…
What does that have to do with…@abandoning the things you like…?
Also, if I were you, I'd be careful about@how I throw away my, uh...books...
…My bad, I didn't mean to dump a bunch of@questions on you all at once…
…I just wanted to know what made you decide@on this…
(Someone found her circle checklist,@and when the questions started coming,)
(she got carried away answering them@in the heat of the moment…)
[chara:305601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into](Oof…@I'm no stranger to that kind of tragic accident…)
…When people ask me things, I want to answer.@I know that feeling…all too well.

group_1.textLeft: It happened to you too, Rui...?!

group_1.textRight: I think this is…@probably a path that a lot of people go down.
A rite of passage for geeks everywhere…
